com.mygdx.game

Class Roboticon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Roboticon

  • public class Roboticon
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    Assessment 2
    Version:
    Assessment 2 An executable version of the game can be found at: https://jm179796.github.io/SEPR/DRTN-Assessment2.jar Our website is: https://jm179796.github.io/SEPR/
    Author:
    Duck Related Team Name in Big Massive Letters

      Unique numerical identifier of the roboticon.
      private int[] Upgrades
      Upgrade array, holds the possible levels of upgrade for the current robot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Roboticon

        public Roboticon(int ID,
                 Player Player,
                 Tile Tile)
        Constructor of the class
        Parameters:
        ID - An integer uniquely defining the roboticon, starting at 0
        Player - A Player object to own the roboticon
        Tile - A Tile object the roboticon is positioned on and therefore belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        public int[] getLevel()
        Function to get the current roboticon Level
        Returns:
        Integer array of the resource

      • getRoboticonID

        public int getRoboticonID()

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(int resource)
        Method to upgrade a single level of the roboticon.

        The parameter 'Resource' specifies 'Ore', 'Energy' or 'Food' to be upgraded one level.

        0: ORE 1: ENERGY 2: FOOD

      • possibleUpgrades

        public int[] possibleUpgrades()
        A method to return an array of all possible upgrades available to the roboticon at its current state
        Returns:
        Upgrades Returns an Integer Array in the form [Ore, Energy, Food]

      • productionModifier

        public java.lang.Integer[] productionModifier()
        A method to return the production modifier offered by the roboticon.

        Contains inherent randomness, not just a 1:1 ratio of level to return each phase of production. The modifier is used outside of this class to multiply the inherent resources located on that tile.

        Returns:
        Modifiers Array to return the modifier for resource production, stored [Ore, Energy, Food]

      • getIcon

        public com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image getIcon()
        Returns an Image object with the texture of the roboticon's icon mapped to it
        Returns:
        Image Icon representing the roboticon

      • getIconTexture

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture getIconTexture()
        Returns the texture file encoding the roboticon's icon
        Returns:
        Texture The texture encoding the roboticon's icon

      • getOreUpgradeCost

      • getMaxLevel

        public int getMaxLevel()
        Provides the maximum level to which this roboticon can be upgraded to (across all three individual upgrade types)
        Returns:
        Integer The roboticon's consistent level cap
